cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.DB. 

The paper discusses the optimization of Real-Time Bidding (RTB) campaigns, which involves selecting the most profitable configurations of users' profiles and publishers' websites. This topic is closely related to information retrieval (IR) and artificial intelligence (AI), as it involves selecting the most relevant and profitable options. Additionally, the paper mentions the use of machine learning techniques to optimize the campaigns, which falls under the category of machine learning (LG). The paper also discusses the use of data analysis and selection techniques, which are related to data science (DS) and database (DB) subcategories.
